title: New: Andy Stott – Leaving (The Recycle Culture Uplift)
content: It’s been a great year for Andy Stott, this year’s Luxury Problems finally saw the Manchester producer break out of the UK/Brooklyn techno scene and into the grander musical arena. A grander musical arena that if anything coincided with a record that was as difficult, if not more so, than his past material. Focusing almost entirely on looped sounds, Stott delicately manipulates vocals and ‘found sound’ to ultimate exploitation. It’s the music of a paranoid and obsessive character. So perhaps It’s with half a degree fun and another half arrogance that anonymous producer Recycle Culture has reworked Stotts album track, Leaving, into a barf inducing trance tune. Let’s just say it almost, almost, works, and leave it at that.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
